**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Sensitive data will be encrypted before being sent over insecure connections like the internet.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Encrypt Sensitive Data During Transmission

**Description**: To ensure the dignity and privacy of users, all sensitive data will be encrypted before being transmitted over insecure connections such as the internet. This encryption will be transparently communicated to users, ensuring they understand how their data is being protected.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system provides storage of all databases on redundant computers with automatic switchover.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Redundant and Transparent Database Storage

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to store all databases on redundant computers with automatic switchover. This ensures that in case of a computer failure, my data remains accessible without any interruption, and I am transparently informed about the redundancy measures taken to protect my data.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The reliability of the overall program depends on the reliability of the separate components. The main pillar of reliability of the system is the backup of the database which is continuously maintained and updated to reflect the most recent changes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Reliable and Transparent Database Backup System

**Description**: As a user of the system, I want the database backup process to be reliable and transparent, ensuring continuous maintenance and updates to reflect the most recent changes. This will ensure that my data is protected and maintained with the highest integrity, preserving my dignity and trust in the system.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: An end-user may use this system on any OS
ethical_us:
**Title**: OS Agnostic Access for End-Users

**Description**: As an ethically responsible development team, we ensure that our system can be accessed and used effectively on any operating system. This promotes transparency by providing clear and understandable documentation on compatibility, and it upholds the dignity of end-users by respecting their choice of OS without limiting their access or experience.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The logo and the current basic design of registration system should be displayed. The system should be attractive according to the clients. The design and the color should make users feel comfortable when using the system instead of flashing useless colors on the screen. The design should also reflect the seriousness of the environment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Dignified User Interface Design for Registration System

**Description**: The registration system should display a clear and transparent logo alongside its basic design to ensure organisational transparency. The overall design and color scheme should be comfortable and dignified, avoiding flashy or distracting elements. This careful design approach aims to respect the user's dignity and ensure they have a comfortable and serious experience while using the system.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system should be able to manage all the information incoming from the database and the catalogue.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Manage Information Transparently and Respectfully

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to manage all the information incoming from the database and the catalogue in a transparent manner, ensuring that data handling processes are clear and comprehensible, while also respecting the dignity and inherent worth of all individuals whose data is being processed.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The product is Web based therefore it will be used in any environment that allows Web access.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Accessibility and Clarity for Web-Based Product Use

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: For the system to successfully operate the registration system should be integrated with other IT services and the portal.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Integration of Registration System with IT Services and Portal

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system should need to be entirely self-supporting since the users would be using it only to register courses.
ethical_us:

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Compatibility of Web Interface with Standards

**Description**: As a user, I want the web interface to be compatible with all major web browsers and adhere to established standards, so that I can access the platform seamlessly in various environments without any barriers, ensuring a transparent and dignified user experience.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Everyone (stakeholders and guests) can have access to the system and the catalogue. Every client must have secure and private access to his/her data. The  and the service man can have access to every part of the system. All these accesses (except the “guest tour” access) require identification through ID and password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Secure and Private Access for All Users

**Description**: The system must provide transparent access to the catalogue for all stakeholders and guests. Each client must have secure and private access to their data. Service personnel must have access to all parts of the system, but all access (except for guest tours) must require secure identification through ID and password. This process must be clearly communicated and easily understandable to all users, maintaining their dignity by ensuring their data is handled responsibly and with respect.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system will develop a security system that will reduce to the minimum the possibility of corruption from systems and/or humans.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Develop a Transparent and Respectful Security System for Minimizing Corruption 

**Description**: As a developer, I want to create a security system that minimizes the possibility of corruption from systems and/or humans, ensuring transparency and upholding the dignity of all stakeholders involved. This system will provide clear, understandable processes and maintain the inherent worth and rights of individuals while preventing unethical behaviors.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The Operational Interface shall have a Mean Time Between Failures of no less than 7 days.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Operational Interface Reliability for User Dignity and Transparency

**Description**: As a user, I want the Operational Interface to have a Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) of no less than 7 days, so that I can rely on the system for consistent operation and maintain my dignity by avoiding disruptions in service. Additionally, I need transparent communication about any potential issues or updates regarding system reliability to trust the platform.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall be available 99.5% of the time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure High Availability with Transparent Operations and Respect for User Dignity

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be available 99.5% of the time while receiving transparent information about any downtime, so that I can trust and plan my usage effectively without feeling disrespected or undervalued by unexpected service interruptions.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The software system needs a robust security mechanism in place so that unauthorized users are not allowed access to parts of the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Robust Security Mechanism

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Each user shall either be trusted or not trusted.
ethical_us:

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

ethical_us:

**Ethical principles used**: transparency, dignity

text: All source code shall adhere to an agreed upon and well-defined set of coding standards for each development language used.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Since the software must run on several popular hardware platforms and the goal is to achieve a reasonable level of platform independence.

text: High level of performance requires high speed network and high level of connectivity.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure High Performance with Transparent Connectivity Requirements

 **Description**: As a user, I want the application to clearly communicate the high-speed network and connectivity requirements necessary to achieve optimal performance. This includes specifying the recommended network speed, any potential performance degradation at lower speeds, and ways to optimize network settings to uphold my dignity by allowing me to understand and manage my own connectivity needs effectively.

 **Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The available server must be reliable and the network connectivity in the supermarket should be proper for smooth flow of all operations and data.
ethical_us:

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Every user of the software is provided a unique login ID and a password which is stored in the database hashed by SHA2 algorithm.

This ensures that my personal information is encrypted and handled in a way that respects my dignity and builds my trust in the system.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: System will use secured database

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Normal users can just read information but they cannot edit or modify anything except their personal and some other information.

This transparency in access control honors my dignity by respecting my role and responsibilities within the system.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: System will have different types of users and every user has access constraints.

This will allow everyone to comprehend their roles, the data they can access, and their responsibilities, while also ensuring that every user's inherent dignity is respected by treating them equitably.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Control the database and keep track of all records of customers and employee details.

This includes making the processes and policies for data management easily understandable and accessible to those whose data is being stored, so that all stakeholders can be assured that their personal information is being managed transparently and with respect for their inherent dignity.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Contact with the vendors and give permission to sell their product under the site after testing the product’s quality.

This will involve clear communication with vendors regarding the testing process and results. By doing so, we will provide transparent information about product quality to our customers and maintain their trust, while also respecting the dignity of our vendors by acknowledging their right to understand how and why their products are evaluated.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: View the details of all employees and control the whole site.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

This ensures that the login process is clear and treats users with inherent worth, maintaining their dignity.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: New users can sign up by creating new ID.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Can purchase any product through valid credit card.

**Title**: Ethical and Transparent Purchasing Process

**Description**: As a user, I should be able to purchase any product through a valid credit card, with clear and transparent information about the transaction process, ensuring that my dignity and rights as a consumer are respected throughout the experience.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Can give feedback to the 24X7 Customer Care Service center about their impression for the site and services.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Respectful Customer Feedback System

**Description**:
As a user of the 24X7 Customer Care Service center, I want to provide feedback about my impression of the site and services in a manner that is transparent and respects my dignity. This involves clear communication on how my feedback will be used and ensuring that the process for giving feedback is straightforward and respectful.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Customer must logout of the site after purchasing products.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a user, I want to be automatically logged out of the site after purchasing products to ensure that my session does not remain active unnecessarily, thereby protecting my personal and financial information. This will make the system more transparent about session management and uphold my dignity by respecting my privacy and security.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Can only visit the site without registration.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to visit and browse the site without the need to register, ensuring my personal autonomy and dignity are respected, while also maintaining clear transparency about the site's data collection and usage practices.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Vendors must take permission from the Administrator for selling their products under the site. Administrator will test product’s quality according to its market price to permit vendor for selling purpose.

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to ensure that vendors obtain permission before selling their products on the site. This permission will be granted only after a thorough assessment of the product's quality in relation to its market price, thereby maintaining transparency in the approval process and respecting the dignity of both vendors and consumers.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Can consult with the Administrator regarding product’s quality and advertisements.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Consultation with Administrator on Product Quality and Advertisements

**Description**: As a user, I want to consult with the Administrator regarding the product's quality and advertisements to ensure that the information I receive is transparent and respects my dignity. This consultation should provide clear, understandable, and accurate information about the product, allowing me to make informed decisions while feeling that my inherent worth and rights are respected.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: View the personal details of the customer.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Respectful Customer Information Access

**Description**: As a user, I want to transparently view the personal details of the customer while ensuring that their dignity and inherent worth are respected, so that I can make informed decisions without compromising their personal rights.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Responsible for properly allocating the selected product according to the customer’s choice and delivering product to the customer.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Product Allocation and Delivery

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Keep track of each product item’s stocks for selling purpose.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Responsible for informing administrator when any product item’s stock goes under the minimum level.

**Description**: As an e-commerce platform, we need to transparently inform the administrator when any product item's stock goes under the minimum level. This ensures administrators are aware of inventory changes in a timely manner, allowing them to maintain control and dignity over stock management without being blindsided by unexpected shortages.

**Ethical principles used**: transparency, dignity

text: Taking permission from the Administrator for the product to be purchased from vendor.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Vendor Selection Transparency and Dignity in Purchase Approval Process

**Description**: As a system user, I want the process of obtaining administrative permission for purchasing products from vendors to be transparent and respect the dignity of all individuals involved. This includes clear communication of the criteria and procedures for approval, ensuring that all stakeholders understand the decision-making process, and treating all requests and persons with equal respect and fairness.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Responsible for managing stocks of each product items.

**Title**: Ethical Stock Management System

**Description**: As a stock manager, I want a system that transparently displays stock levels of each product item while ensuring that inventory management practices respect the dignity of employees and stakeholders. This includes clear communication of stock data, understandable interfaces, and fair allocation of inventory handling tasks.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Keep track of all the payment transactions made by the customers and update the payment information.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a customer, I want all my payment transactions to be tracked and my payment information updated accurately, with a clear and understandable log of these actions, so that I can maintain trust in the system and feel that my dignity and privacy are respected.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Responsible for contacting the banks for the validation of the a/c number provided by the customer while purchasing and make the transaction from the given a/c.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Customer Account Validation and Transaction Transparency

**Description**: As a customer, I want the application to transparently validate my provided account number with the bank before completing any purchase transactions. This ensures that I am informed about the status and legitimacy of my account validation and that my dignity is respected by not making unauthorized transactions.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Consult with the Administrator about the payment details of the customers for the updating of the database.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Consult with the Administrator Transparently for Customer Payment Updates

**Description**: As a user, I want to consult with the Administrator about the payment details of the customers transparently and ensure that the process respects the dignity of the individuals involved. This includes clear communication about why the information is needed, how it will be used, and making sure that customers are treated with respect and their personal information is handled sensitively.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Provide feasible solutions to the customers on their complaints and queries.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Respectful Resolution of Customer Complaints and Queries

**Description**: As a customer service representative, I want to provide feasible solutions to customer complaints and queries in a transparent manner, ensuring that customers fully understand the processes and decisions, while treating them with dignity and respect to uphold their inherent worth.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system should require the user to state time when should the doughnut be delivered
ethical_us:

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system is expected to have reasonable short time response. The voter should be able to login and should be able to get response for his requests in 2-3 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timely and Respectful User Interaction

**Description**: As a voter, I want the system to respond to my login and request interactions within 2-3 seconds consistently so that my experience is efficient and respectful of my time and dignity. This also ensures transparency by providing clear and understandable feedback promptly.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The data transaction between client and server must be encrypted using SSL technology.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Encrypted Data Transactions

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: All the passwords that are generated or accepted must be stored in database in an encrypted form.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Encrypted Storage of User Passwords

**Description**: As a system administrator, I want all passwords that are generated or accepted by the system to be stored in an encrypted form in the database, to ensure that users' credentials remain secure and protected from unauthorized access. This transparency in our security protocols will help maintain user dignity by safeguarding their private information.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: To prevent attacks the system should generate random word and ask the user to enter it correctly for multiple tryings.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Respectful User Verification

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be simple to use, so that I can easily understand and navigate through it, preserving my dignity by not feeling overwhelmed or frustrated, and ensuring transparency in how the system operates.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The physician/pharmacist must have a valid user login to access the system.

**Title**: Valid User Login for Physician/Pharmacist Access

**Description**: As a physician/pharmacist, I must have a valid user login to access the system, ensuring that my professional credentials are verified. This will guarantee that all actions taken within the system can be traced back to a certified medical professional, thereby maintaining transparency and ensuring respect for the dignity of patients and healthcare providers.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: A failed login will alert the physician/pharmacist.

text: The system shall enable user to enter the search text on the screen.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Provide Understandable Search Interface

**Description**: As a user, I want the search text entry interface to be clear, understandable, and easy to use so that I can input my search queries efficiently and without confusion. This will ensure that I can interact with the system without feeling overwhelmed or disregarded.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall enable user to select multiple options on the screen to search.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enable Multiple Option Selection for User-Friendly Search

**Description**: As a user, I want to easily select multiple options on the screen while searching, so that my interaction with the system is intuitive, straightforward, and respects my decision-making process.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

Explanation:
- **Transparency**: Ensuring the system's interface is clear and easy to understand, enabling users to see and select multiple options without confusion.
- **Dignity**: Respecting the user's inherent worth by designing the interface in a manner that values and facilitates their decision-making freedom.

text: The system shall display all the matching products based on the search.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Display Search Results with Transparency and Dignity

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display all matching products based on my search in a clear, transparent manner, ensuring that I understand why each product appears in the results. The products displayed should respect my dignity by avoiding any biased or inappropriate content.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall display only 10 matching result on the current screen.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Display Limited Matching Results Respecting User Clarity and Dignity

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display only 10 matching results on the current screen to ensure that I am not overwhelmed by excessive information and can easily understand and navigate through the search results, thereby respecting my cognitive capacity and personal dignity.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall enable user to navigate between the search results.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Friendly and Transparent Navigation

**Description**: As a user of the system, I want to be able to navigate between search results easily and clearly understand the process, so I can feel respected and confident that the system is providing me with an equitable and dignified experience.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall notify the user when no matching product is found on the search.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Notify User When No Matching Product is Found

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical User Authentication for Profile Viewing

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall allow user to register for newsletters and surveys in the profile.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall display the customer support contact numbers on the screen.

**Title**: Display Customer Support Contact Information Transparently

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall display the FAQ’s upon request.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall maintain customer email information as a required part of customer profile.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall provide shopping cart during online purchase.

text: The system shall allow user to add/remove products in the shopping cart.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Management of Shopping Cart Actions

text: The system shall enable user to select the shipping method during payment process.

text: The system shall display tentative duration for shipping.

text: The system shall allow user to enter the order information for tracking.

**Title**: Transparent and Respectful Tax Calculation

**Title**: Display Transparent and Respectful Tax Information

- **Dignity**: Keeping users updated respects their inherent worth, allowing them to exercise control and make decisions concerning their orders.

text: The system shall enable the user to enter their reviews and ratings.

The system must ensure that all reviews are shown honestly and without manipulation, while also protecting user identity to prevent any potential misuse or harm.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall display all the available financing options.

**Title**: Transparent and Respectful Financing Option Selection

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall display all the available promotions to the user.

**Title**: Display Transparent and Respectful Promotions

text: The system shall allow user to select available promotion.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall allow user to confirm the purchase.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall enable user to enter the payment information.

**Title**: Transparent and Respectful Payment Information Entry

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall provide a digital image for each product in the product catalog.
ethical_us:

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall provide use of icons and toolbars.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clearly Understandable Icons and Toolbars

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall provide handicap access.
ethical_us:

This will uphold the dignity of all users by allowing equitable access to the system's functionalities.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider for T3 access with 99.9999% availability.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Contractual Agreement for High-Availability Internet Service

**Description**: As a user, I need a clear and comprehensive contractual agreement with the internet service provider that guarantees T3 access with 99.9999% availability. **Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider who can provide 99.999% availability through their network facilities onto the internet.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Respectful Service Agreements

**Description**: As a customer, I want the system to provide a clear and comprehensible contractual agreement with an internet service provider that guarantees 99.999% availability. This agreement should outline all terms, conditions, and commitments in detail to respect my dignity and ensure transparency.

**Ethical principles used**: transparency, dignity

text: The product shall be based on web and has to be run from a web server.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Web-Based Server Deployment

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to be web-based and operated from a web server such that the system’s functions and data handling practices are explained clearly and transparently, and the platform respects and upholds my inherent dignity through respectful user interface design and data protection measures.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The product shall take initial load time depending on internet connection strength which also depends on the media from which the product is run.

**Title**: Ensure Transparent Initial Load Time Based on Connection Strength

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to clearly communicate its initial load time based on the internet connection strength and the media from which it is run, so that I can understand the wait times and feel respected and valued.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The performance shall depend upon hardware components of the client/customer.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Communication of Hardware Requirements and Respect for User Dignity

**Description**: As a user, I want clear and transparent communication about the hardware requirements needed for optimal performance of the AI system, to ensure that my dignity is respected by not being misled or underserved due to insufficient hardware.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall use secure sockets in all transactions that include any confidential customer information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure Communication for Confidential Customer Information

**Description**: As a customer, I want all transactions involving my confidential information to use secure sockets so that I can be assured that my personal data is protected and handled with respect.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Dignified Automatic Logout for Inactive Customers

**Description**: As a customer, I want the system to transparently log me out after a period of inactivity to ensure my personal dignity is respected and my session remains secure. This process should be communicated to me clearly, including the duration of inactivity and the fact that I will be logged out to protect my personal data and privacy.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall confirm all transactions with the customer’s web browser.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Transaction Confirmation

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to confirm all transactions through my web browser so that I can be aware of each transaction in real-time and ensure the service is respecting my decision-making process.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing the user’s password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Handling of User Passwords in Cookies

**Description**: As a responsible system, I must avoid leaving any cookies on the customer’s computer that contain the user’s password. This ensures that the handling of sensitive data is transparent to the user and upholds their dignity by protecting their personal information from potential misuse.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing any of the user’s confidential information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Cookie Management for User Confidentiality

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to ensure that no cookies on my computer contain any of my confidential information, so that my privacy and personal data are protected, and I understand how my data is being handled.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s password.  It shall always be echoed with special characters representing typed characters.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Masking Customer Passwords for Enhanced Privacy

**Description**: As a user, I want my password to be masked with special characters when typed into the web browser, so that my sensitive information is not displayed and my privacy is maintained.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s credit card number after retrieving from the database.  It shall always be shown with just the last 4 digits of the credit card number.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Mask Credit Card Numbers for Customer Protection

**Description**: As a customer, I want my credit card number to be displayed with only the last four digits visible when retrieved from the database, so that my financial information is protected and I can trust the handling of my sensitive data. This ensures that only minimal information is exposed, preserving my dignity and enhancing transparency about data handling practices.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system’s back-end servers shall never display a customer’s password.  The customer’s password may be reset but never shown.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Password Handling

**Description**: As a system designer, I want the back-end servers to ensure that customer passwords are never displayed. While allowing for password resets, this will protect the customer’s sensitive information, thereby maintaining transparency and respecting their dignity.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system’s back-end databases shall be encrypted.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Encrypt Back-End Databases for Enhanced Security

**Description**: As a user, I want the system's back-end databases to be encrypted so that my personal and sensitive data is protected, ensuring transparency about data security measures and preserving my dignity.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall allow the user to register for an account from any page in the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Clear and Respectful User Registration Process

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to register for an account from any page in the system, with clear, transparent instructions and processes, while ensuring that my dignity and personal data are respected.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system will use a single password per user to login to the E-Store System.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Single Password Login Implementation

**Description**: The system will use a single password per user to login to the E-Store System. It will ensure that each user's password handling process is transparent and respects the dignity of the users by clearly communicating how passwords are stored, used, and protected. Users will be kept informed about password policies and any changes to login protocols, ensuring they understand and consent to the methods used to secure their data.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall use secure socket layer (SSL) technology to ensure all payments made online and user logins are secure.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As an online user, I want all my payments and login sessions to be encrypted using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology, so that I can trust my sensitive personal information is handled securely and with respect to my dignity.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Any page of the application should not take more than 6 seconds to load on a DSL broadband connection.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a user, I want every page of the application to load in under 6 seconds on a DSL broadband connection so that I can have a seamless and respectful user experience. Additionally, I want to be informed about any instances where the page load time may exceed this limit, ensuring transparent communication regarding performance expectations.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system may be throttled or slowed down on heavy loads to ensure service for everybody. By throttling is meant that certain functionality may be unavailable during heavy server load.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Fair Resource Allocation During Heavy Loads

**Description**: As a system user, I want to be informed when the system is experiencing heavy loads and understand which functionalities may be temporarily unavailable. This ensures that services are fairly distributed among all users and that everyone's dignity is respected by providing clear communication about system performance.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The application should be able to support 100 concurrent users without any performance degradation.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Transparency and Dignity in Application Performance for Concurrent Users

**Description**: As a user, I want the application to transparently support 100 concurrent users without performance degradation, ensuring my digital experience maintains the highest level of dignity and respect, without sacrificing speed, reliability, or usability.

**Ethical principles used**: transparency, dignity

text: The system should be able to scale up to 500 concurrent users (if there is a need in the future) by installing additional hardware components.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Transparent and Dignified Scaling for User Load

**Description**: As a system administrator, I want the system to be able to scale up to 500 concurrent users by installing additional hardware components. This should be clearly documented and communicated to users to maintain transparency, and the scaling process should respect user dignity by ensuring system performance and reliability are maintained during high load periods.

**Ethical principles used**: transparency, dignity

text: The MTBF (if any) should not be less than 2 months.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Reliable System Performance 

**Description**: As a system user, I want the Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) of the system to be no less than 2 months, so that I can trust its reliability and ensure my dignity is respected by not experiencing frequent disruptions.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: A secure server will be required to ensure confidentiality of customer’s credit card and other details.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Server for Confidential Customer Data

**Description**: As a customer, I want my credit card and other personal details to be stored on a secure server, so that my sensitive information is kept confidential and my dignity is respected. Additionally, I want transparency in how my data is protected and managed to gain trust in the company's data handling practices.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The user interface of the system should be very user friendly.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User-Friendly and Intuitive User Interface

**Description**: As an end user, I want the user interface to be highly intuitive and user-friendly so that I can easily understand and navigate through the system without confusion or frustration. The interface should be designed to promote ease of use, respect for user dignity, and clear communication of information.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: It should not take more than 120 seconds for a new user to register for an account.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Registration Process Transparency and Dignity

**Description**: As a new user, I want a clear and respectful account registration process that takes no more than 120 seconds, so that I can understand and trust the platform without feeling rushed or undervalued.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: It should not take more than 90 seconds for a registered user to place an order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Order Placement Transparency and Respect for User Dignity

**Description**: As a registered user, I should be able to place an order within 90 seconds, ensuring that the process is transparent and respectful of my dignity. This includes clear communication at each step of the process and safeguarding my personal information throughout the transaction.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system should be easy enough to maintain that someone else could do it with a manual and a few hours training.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Maintainable System for Future Users

**Description**: As a system developer, I want to ensure that the system is designed to be easily maintainable by others with the help of a detailed manual and a few hours of training. This will empower future users to understand and work with the system confidently, respecting their capability and time.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system should be portable to various operating environments.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Portable System with Transparent and Dignified User Experience

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be portable across various operating environments, ensuring clear communication about compatibility and seamless functionality, so that my diverse usage contexts are respected and my experience remains dignified.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: Registered User must be able to maintain his/her session information for at least 60 minutes of inactive session before the system prompts him to log out of the system. The registered user must be provided with all the options of the E-store regardless of the time when he/she logs in.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Session Maintenance with Transparent Communication

**Description**: As a registered user, when my session is maintained for at least 60 minutes of inactivity before prompting me to log out, I expect to be clearly informed about the session timeouts and my activity status. Additionally, I should have access to all available options of the E-store at any time I log in, without my session duration affecting my user rights and experience in a dignified manner.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The entire website must be user-friendly and easily navigable. The website must be provided with a site map for quick access to a particular link according to the requirement specification. The user must be able to find what he/she wants from the site without any difficulty. The website must adhere to branding schemes and the layout of the web pages must be uniform throughout
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enhance Website Usability and Accessibility

**Description**: As a user, I want the website to be user-friendly and easily navigable, with a clearly accessible site map, so that I can find what I need without difficulty. Additionally, the website should adhere to consistent branding and layout schemes to ensure a seamless and dignified user experience that respects my time and effort.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall support up to 10000 simultaneous users against the central database at any given time and up to 5000 simultaneous users against the local servers at any one time. The performance of the website must be optimal incase of huge loads and hence appropriate load balancing must be done to achieve this. There can be any number of mirror servers readily available in case of huge loads without the user getting any delay.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Optimal Performance and Transparency for High User Loads

**Description**: To uphold user dignity by maintaining an optimal website performance during peak traffic, the system must support up to 10,000 simultaneous users against the central database and up to 5,000 simultaneous users against local servers. Transparent communication regarding load balancing mechanisms and the availability of additional mirror servers must be ensured to instill user confidence and trust. This transparency will include providing clear information about how the system handles high loads without causing delays, ensuring users feel respected and informed.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The website must provide highest degree of security to the registered users. All the transactions that are made must be secured. The sensitive information passed to and from the website must be secured. Identity theft and other security related issues must be solved. Unauthorized transmission of sensitive information of the user to third party websites for reference must be avoided. On the basis of user agreement the information must be processed. All the information about the registered user must be securely stored in the central database.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure and Transparent Handling of User Data

**Description**: 
As a registered user of the website, I want the highest degree of security for my sensitive information and transactions to prevent issues like identity theft. I need clear communication and assurance that my data is securely stored and not transmitted to unauthorized third parties. All data handling should be based on user agreements, ensuring that my inherent dignity and rights are respected.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Intuitive and Accessible Interface for User Experience 

**Description**: As a new user, I want the product to be intuitive and self-explanatory so that I can start using it efficiently. The design should respect my inherent worth by providing clear instructions and explanations for key features, ensuring that 90% of new users can begin displaying Events or Activities within 90 minutes.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Intuitive and Self-Explanatory System for User Empowerment

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be intuitive and self-explanatory so that I can easily understand and use it without confusion, ensuring that I feel respected and valued through a seamless user experience.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the realtor community.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Design Intuitive UI for Realtor Community 

**Description**: As a product designer, I want to use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the realtor community so that users can interact with the product in a clear and comprehensible manner, promoting ease of use and respecting their professional dignity.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity

text: The system shall be intuitive to the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Intuitive Design for Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members

**Description**: As a program administrator or nursing staff member, I need the system to be intuitive and easy to navigate, ensuring that it respects my professional competence and efficiently supports my workflow without causing confusion or errors.

**Ethical principles used**: Transparency, Dignity
